## InputDateTimeSelectorComponent.\_stepChangeValue() method

Changes current value of date for for specified part by single step

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _stepChangeValue(part: string, increment: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  part | string | Part of date that should be changed |
|  increment | boolean | Indication whether value should be incremented or decremented |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
